ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] newbie here
ygData.msgSnippet: On EQ2 I am on Crushbone server.  On EQ I am on Cazic Thule server so I went with whatever C named server EQ2 had. As far as lag, are you on dialup?  I had a
ygData.messageBody:
On EQ2 I am on Crushbone server.  On EQ I am on Cazic Thule server so I went with whatever "C" named server EQ2 had.
 
As far as lag, are you on dialup?  I had a lot of lag on EQ2 when I first started it, but I built a new system and now it runs fine.  Definitely need a nice system to run it.
 
Wulfric
 
 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, March 01, 2005 6:32 PM
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] newbie here

What server are you on on WoW?
I've got EQ, SW:G, and WoW. I'm on Alleria realm. I don't play SW:G much and don't play EQ as much as I used to bc its so hard for me to get groups now. With my lag I'm not as efficient a healer as I need to be to get good groups and get xp.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-03-01, 11:37:00 you wrote: =======

>Wow Kwasi, you and I been playing about same length of time.  I started in May 2001just after Kunark expansion pack.  I had to buy EQ classic and Ruins of Kunark separately since at that point nothing was offered as a pack.  I have a copy of EverQuest Trilogy around here that has never been opened which I thought about using to start a 3rd account.  But I just cant afford it, what with an EQ2 account, and a WOW account!
>
>Anyway....  no newb here I guess!
>
>Wulfric
>
>
